description: {"blocks":[{"key":"b89pk","text":"cermep-bids-retro enables the formatting of retrospective PET and MRI data to BIDS standards from DICOM databases. When dealing with pre-clinical imaging modalities, numerous metadata are overlooked during acquisitions making it difficult to automatically format following BIDS guidelines. This python-based project is a flexible method for BIDS formatting with input csv files to compensate for lacking DICOM tags. And advanced data quality assessment.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"phob","text":"This step is key to a functional method. It requires a good knowledge","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f22d9","text":"of the available tags and fields in the DICOM data and one can always refer","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cep12","text":"to the BIDS specifications to define all required tags for their modality.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":12,"length":14}],"data":{}},{"key":"krbs","text":"Substeps below provide description and example for each column of the 3 input files. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"AD0B99C0C89E11EDB7D3BD568AEB346B","url":"https://bids-specification.readthedocs.io/en/stable/01-introduction.html"}}}}
